briefdescription.para: QBrush corresponding to marker's fill style.
Cached image of marker, if using cached version.
QPen corresponding to marker's stroke style.

QBrush to use as fill of selected symbols.
Cached image of selected marker, if using cached version.

briefdescription.para: Maximum width/height of cache image.

memberdef.argsstring: (QgsSimpleMarkerSymbolLayerBase::Shape shape=Circle, double size=DEFAULT_SIMPLEMARKER_SIZE, double angle=DEFAULT_SIMPLEMARKER_ANGLE, QgsSymbol::ScaleMethod scaleMethod=DEFAULT_SCALE_METHOD, const QColor &color=DEFAULT_SIMPLEMARKER_COLOR, const QColor &strokeColor=DEFAULT_SIMPLEMARKER_BORDERCOLOR, Qt::PenJoinStyle penJoinStyle=DEFAULT_SIMPLEMARKER_JOINSTYLE)
memberdef.name: QgsSimpleMarkerSymbolLayer

briefdescription.para: Constructor for QgsSimpleMarkerSymbolLayer.

parameterdescription.para: scaling method for data defined scaling

briefdescription.para: Returns the approximate bounding box of the marker symbol layer, taking into account any data defined overrides and offsets which are set for the marker layer.

simplesect.para: approximate symbol bounds, in painter units

briefdescription.para: Shall be reimplemented by subclasses to create a deep copy of the instance.
The fill color.
Gets fill color.

detaileddescription.para:
Supported by marker and fill layers.
QGIS 2.1

briefdescription.para: Returns a string that represents this layer type.

detaileddescription.para: Used for serialization. Should match with the string used to register this symbol layer in the registry.

briefdescription.para: Returns the units to use for sizes and widths within the symbol layer.

detaileddescription.para:
Individual symbol layer subclasses will interpret this in different ways, e.g., a marker symbol layer may use it to specify the units for the marker size, while a line symbol layer may use it to specify the units for the line width.
output unit, or QgsUnitTypes::RenderUnknownUnit if the symbol layer contains mixed units
setOutputUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the marker's stroke join style (e.g., miter, bevel, etc).
Should be reimplemented by subclasses to return a string map that contains the configuration information for the symbol layer.

detaileddescription.para: This is used to serialize a symbol layer perstistently.

briefdescription.para: Renders a marker at the specified point.

detaileddescription.para:
Derived classes must implement this to handle drawing the point.
point
position at which to render point, in painter units
context
symbol render context

briefdescription.para: The fill color.
Set fill color.

detaileddescription.para:
Supported by marker and fill layers.
QGIS 2.1

briefdescription.para: Sets the units to use for sizes and widths within the symbol layer.

detaileddescription.para:
Individual symbol layer subclasses will interpret this in different ways, e.g., a marker symbol layer may use it to specify the units for the marker size, while a line symbol layer may use it to specify the units for the line width.
unit
output units
outputUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the marker's stroke join style (e.g., miter, bevel, etc).
Sets the marker's stroke color.
Sets the marker's stroke style (e.g., solid, dashed, etc)
Sets the width of the marker's stroke.

parameterdescription.para: stroke width. See strokeWidthUnit() for units.

briefdescription.para: Sets the map scale for the width of the marker's stroke.
Sets the unit for the width of the marker's stroke.
Returns the marker's stroke color.
Returns the marker's stroke style (e.g., solid, dashed, etc)
Returns the width of the marker's stroke.
Returns the map scale for the width of the marker's stroke.
Returns the unit for the width of the marker's stroke.

briefdescription.para: Draws the marker shape in the specified painter.

briefdescription.para: Derived classes must implement draw() to handle drawing the generated shape onto the painter surface.

parameterdescription.para: polygon representing transformed marker shape. May be empty, in which case the shape will be specified in the path argument.
transformed painter path representing shape to draw

briefdescription.para: Simple marker symbol layer, consisting of a rendered shape with solid fill color and an stroke.
